Sentence: Seward sends for his (Seward) old mentor, Professor Van Helsing
Seward and Van Helsing spend several days trying to revive Lucy, performing four blood transfusions
column5: After Lucy's death, Van Helsing leads Holmwood, Seward, and Quincey Morris to her (Lucy) tomb

Sentence: Mina helps Van Helsing collect the various diary and journal entries that Harker, Seward, and the others have written, attempting to piece together a narrative that will lead them to the count
